H0.text: A flag on a pole is the best observable for Ruben to determine the direction of the wind while he is using a compass.

H1.text: The temperature on a thermometer is best for Ruben to observe to help him find the direction of the wind while he is using a compass to determine which way the wind is blowing.

H2.text: Birds flying above the trees are the best observation for Ruben, who is using a compass to find out which direction the wind is blowing.

H3.text: The shadow of a building is the best observation for Ruben to determine the direction the wind is blowing while using a compass.
